title: Happy Veteran’s Day! We talk to Army Staff Sergeant Jerry Majetich On His New Home Move In Day  + Lunchbox Might Be Going to Jail + Raymundo Tells Amy and Eddie He Thinks Parenting Is Easy
itunes:title: Happy Veteran’s Day! We talk to Army Staff Sergeant Jerry Majetich On His New Home Move In Day  + Lunchbox Might Be Going to Jail + Raymundo Tells Amy and Eddie He Thinks Parenting Is Easy
description:
Happy Veteran’s Day! Today we celebrate by talking to Army Staff Sergeant Jerry Majetich who is moving into his “Build Homes for Heroes” house today thanks to all of you! We reveal why Lunchbox’s wife thinks he may be going to change. Raymundo claims that Amy and Eddie make too big a deal and that parenting is actually pretty easy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
